response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am confident that this product could significantly enhance your endeavors or personal life. Given its importance to you, I believe it's essential to find the right balance between fair market value and your perceived worth. Therefore, I propose to offer you the chance to purchase this product for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint, aiming to be fair to both parties while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I trust that this proposal will be mutually beneficial and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 950000}
